elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Name possible expectations that could be placed on the retail trade by the respective stakeholder group.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Institutions (associations, clubs, NGOs, media, etc.)
elements.correctAnswer: Public relations, communication relations, sponsoring contributions, etc.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: State
elements.correctAnswer: Compliance with regulations and laws, paying taxes, etc.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Competition
elements.correctAnswer: Fair competition, no violations of the UWG, etc.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Investors
elements.correctAnswer: Good return on equity (profitability) or appropriate interest rate

elements.name: panel2
elements.title: Name possible expectations that could be placed on the retail trade by the respective stakeholder group.

elements.name: question6
elements.title: Employees
elements.correctAnswer: Reasonable salary, secure job, fair working conditions, training opportunities, etc.

elements.name: question7
elements.title: Customers
elements.correctAnswer: Finding the desired products, appropriate price-performance ratio, store opening hours, etc.
